text:
I was getting this error at this step: es_client.indices.create(index=index_name, body=index_settings)
I checked the log of the elasticsearch server and running this command, the status was red: curl -X GET "http://localhost:9200/_cluster/health?pretty"
My problem was that I did not have enough disk space in my computer for docker images. I ended up removing unused ones, manually and pruning:
docker image prune
docker volume prune
docker container prune
Added by Ibai Irastorza
question: Can not create the index: Connection timeout.
